text:
So... whats the status on building binaries out of Julia programs?
I've seen PackageCompiler, but the binaries are "big in size". 1.7 is rumored to have better static compilation.... Can we get complete AOT compilation in Julia, in the future？

elements.text:
So... whats the status on building binaries out of Julia programs?
I've seen PackageCompiler, but the binaries are "big in size". 1.7 is rumored to have better static compilation.... Can we get complete AOT compilation in Julia, in the future？

text:
> "big in size".
An argument is that if your application is supposed to be big (> GB), then the constant overhead (~100MB) of Julia's dynamic facilities is negligible.

elements.text: "big in size".
